text.value: [JA]Select One or More [TEXT_KEYTERM_USAGE_CHARGES] to Add to this [TEXT_KEYTERM_PRODUCT_OFFERING]

[JA]Currently, this Product Offering does not contain any Priceable Items or Discounts.

Click javascript:NavigateToItem(,-2); here to go to the product offering screen to add items
[JA]This parameter table is not mapped to a pricelist for this product offering. Please select the '<xsl:value-of select="../../name" />' priceable item above and create a mapping.
[JA]Parameter Tables To Have Their Price List Mappings Updated

[JA]Currently, this Product Offering does not contain any Priceable Items or Discounts.

Please return to the Product Offering screen to add items to be included in the product offering.
[JA]This parameter table is not mapped to a pricelist.
[JA]Currently there are no priceable items of this type in the Product Catalog
[JA]This Price List contains rates or configuration information for the following items
